carwow | London | ONSITE | Junior, Mid & Senior Full Stack Ruby Developers

carwow is the most convenient, stress-free way to find and buy a new car, at a price you can be confident in.

We’re a driven, energetic startup with a team of 140+ based in central London and Munich. We’ve raised over £48m in funding since we launched, so we’re growing fast. We’re relentlessly driven and constantly asking ourselves how we can make carwow better.

We love Ruby, JavaScript, Git, TDD, and OSS and use a bunch of other technologies daily; Haml, Sass, Heroku, AWS being the most usual suspects.

Salaries range from £35k to £75k (dependant on skills and experience).

For more info, please contact jason.wong@carwow.co.uk
